title: XMPP Check
description: A configuration for a check that uses the XMPP protocol.

host.description: The IP or hostname of the host to run the XMPP check against.

username.description: The user to log in to the XMPP server with.

password.description: The password for the user you wish to log in with.

port.description: The TCP port the XMPP server should be listening on.

encrypted.description: Whether to use TLS when connecting to the XMPP server.
